member.name: T:LoggerLib.ChatLog
member.summary: ChatLog implements ILoggingService for it's type.

member.name: M:LoggerLib.ChatLog.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Append a message to log file.

member.name: T:LoggerLib.EnterpriseLogger
member.summary: EnterpriseLogger implements ILoggingService, so is of type ILoggingService

member.name: T:LoggerLib.ILoggingService
member.summary: Interface to be implemented by Logger classes.

member.name: M:LoggerLib.ILoggingService.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Log to a text file or other logging mechanism.
